entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries or rain showers beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022
